languages.text: "Наши методики дознания весьма обширны и многообразны. Однако ничто так не развязывает языки, как телесная кара: побои, увечья, истязания, показательные расправы". {n}Иокаста чуть ли не мурлыкает, перечисляя способы заставить людей страдать.{/n} "В сочетании с психологическим давлением они творят чудеса".

"Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."
languages.original_text: "Наши методики дознания весьма обширны и многообразны. Однако ничто так не развязывает языки, как телесная кара: побои, увечья, истязания, показательные расправы". {n}Иокаста чуть ли не мурлыкает, перечисляя способы заставить людей страдать.{/n} "В сочетании с психологическим давлением они творят чудеса".

traits.locale_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

"Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

"Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

"Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

"Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

languages.text: “我们的审讯手段多种多样，不过最为行之有效的手段当属体罚，包括殴打、残虐、折磨、公开处决。”{n}苏尔贝克在列举这些给人带来痛苦的手段时，几乎发出了满意的呼噜声。{/n}“当这些手段与心理压力结合使用时，我们往往会收到奇迹般的成效。”
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

traits.locale_text: “我们的审讯手段多种多样，不过最为行之有效的手段当属体罚，包括殴打、残虐、折磨、公开处决。”{n}苏尔贝克在列举这些给人带来痛苦的手段时，几乎发出了满意的呼噜声。{/n}“当这些手段与心理压力结合使用时，我们往往会收到奇迹般的成效。”

languages.text: «Nuestras técnicas de interrogatorio son amplias y variadas. Pero no hay nada mejor que el castigo corporal para soltar la lengua: palizas, mutilaciones, tortura, ejecuciones públicas». {n}Sauerback casi parece ronronear de placer al enumerar los distintos métodos para causar sufrimiento.{/n} «Si los combinamos con presión psicológica, estos métodos obran maravillas».
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras técnicas de interrogatorio son amplias y variadas. Pero no hay nada mejor que el castigo corporal para soltar la lengua: palizas, mutilaciones, tortura, ejecuciones públicas». {n}Sauerback casi parece ronronear de placer al enumerar los distintos métodos para causar sufrimiento.{/n} «Si los combinamos con presión psicológica, estos métodos obran maravillas».

languages.text: 「私たちの尋問テクニックは多岐にわたる。しかし、体罰ほど舌の根を緩めるものはない。殴打、切断、拷問、それに公開処刑…」{n}ザウアーバックは、人々を苦しめる方法を列挙しながら、笑いそうになっている。 {/n}「心理的な圧力と組み合わせることで、このような方法は驚くべき効果を発揮するのです」
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの尋問テクニックは多岐にわたる。しかし、体罰ほど舌の根を緩めるものはない。殴打、切断、拷問、それに公開処刑…」{n}ザウアーバックは、人々を苦しめる方法を列挙しながら、笑いそうになっている。 {/n}「心理的な圧力と組み合わせることで、このような方法は驚くべき効果を発揮するのです」

languages.text: "Unsere Verhörtechniken sind umfassend und vielfältig. Allerdings lockert nichts die Zunge besser, als körperliche Züchtigung: Schläge, Verstümmelung, Folter, öffentliche Hinrichtungen." {n}Sauerback schnurrt angesichts dieser Auflistung von Grausamkeiten beinahe.{/n} "In Kombination mit psychologischem Druck wirken derartige Methoden Wunder."
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Verhörtechniken sind umfassend und vielfältig. Allerdings lockert nichts die Zunge besser, als körperliche Züchtigung: Schläge, Verstümmelung, Folter, öffentliche Hinrichtungen." {n}Sauerback schnurrt angesichts dieser Auflistung von Grausamkeiten beinahe.{/n} "In Kombination mit psychologischem Druck wirken derartige Methoden Wunder."

languages.text: « Nos techniques d'interrogatoire sont nombreuses et variées. Cependant, rien ne délie les langues comme les châtiments corporels : passages à tabac, mutilations, torture, exécutions publiques, et j'en passe. » {n}Sauerback en viendrait presque à ronronner de plaisir en énumérant les divers moyens de faire souffrir son prochain.{/n} « Combinées à la pression psychologique, ces méthodes font merveille. »
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."

traits.locale_text: « Nos techniques d'interrogatoire sont nombreuses et variées. Cependant, rien ne délie les langues comme les châtiments corporels : passages à tabac, mutilations, torture, exécutions publiques, et j'en passe. » {n}Sauerback en viendrait presque à ronronner de plaisir en énumérant les divers moyens de faire souffrir son prochain.{/n} « Combinées à la pression psychologique, ces méthodes font merveille. »

languages.text: "Envaiçeşit sorgu tekniğimiz mevcut. Ancak dayak, yaralama, işkence ve halkın önünde infaz gibi fiziksel cezalar kadar dillerini çözecek hiçbir şey olamaz." {n}Sauerback, insanlara acı çektirme yollarını sayarken âdeta kedi gibi mırıldıyor.{/n} "Psikolojik baskıyla da birleşince bu tür yöntemlerin mucizevi sonuçları oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Our interrogation techniques are broad and varied. However, nothing loosens the tongue like corporal punishment: beatings, mutilations, torture, public executions." {n}Sauerback almost purrs as she lists ways of making people suffer.{/n} "When combined with psychological pressure, such methods work wonders."
